official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Global Child Nutrition Month.

summary.text: Supports the goals of Global Child Nutrition Month. Urges the Administration to develop a comprehensive plan which will provide for the expansion of nutrition programs, especially for young children, as part of President Obama's goal to eliminate childhood hunger in the United States by 2015.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Global Child Nutrition Month.
